block.para: The following code examples show how to:

listitem.para: Create and run a crawler that crawls a public &S3long; (&S3;) bucket and generates a metadata database that describes the CSV-formatted data it finds.
List information about databases and tables in your &GLUDCLong;.
Create and run a job that extracts CSV data from the source &S3; bucket, transforms it by removing and renaming fields, and loads JSON-formatted output into another &S3; bucket.
List information about job runs and view some of the transformed data.
Delete all resources created by the demo.
